title: 100 Days (1991)
description: Gifted with powers to oversee incidents much before they happen; Devi attempts to uncover the secrets of her sister Rama's death whose body was discovered in one of the walls of her multi-millionaire husband, Ram Kumar bungalow. Devi's investigations lead her to discover that Ram Kumar was involved in the death of her sister - while she has another vision - such a vision that will make her a target by an unstoppable assassin. Written by gavin (racktoo@hotmail.com)
